description:
Please confirm your attendance here:
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/reactor-talk-what-is-blockchain-tickets-57696357358

More info on the event:
Curious about blockchain and cryptocurrencies, but don’t know what it is? Great!

Come and join us to learn all about it!

We’ll help you understand what blockchain is, what’s the difference from cryptocurrency and how it will change the future of technology.

Note: No programming or technical knowledge needed.

...

The Speaker: Mário Alves

Mário Alves is a former PwC Consultant and Investment Banker.

Once he discovered the potential of blockchain, he knew he had to take a leap of faith.

He then founded the Blockchain Center Portugal and he’s an Advisor of several blockchain companies, currently helping them to grasp the new economic model driven by Blockchain.

Currently, he’s also the Founder and CEO of TAIKAI, the first blockchain open innovation platform.

...

Join us!

This event is FREE to attend, but you have to register yourself first.

Bring a Friend and see you there!
name: What is Blockchain?
